original_text: And he set captains of war over the people, and gathered them together to him in the street of the gate of the city, and spake comfortably to them, saying,
korean_text: 군대 지휘관들을 세워 백성을 거느리게 하고 성문 광장에서 자기 앞에 무리를 모으고 말로 위로하여 이르되

sentences.original_text: And he set captains of war over the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 백성 위에 전쟁의 대장을 세우고

sentences.original_text: and gathered them together to him
in street of the gate of the city
